channel.title: [508] What the hell
channel.description:
I have 2 NPCS that don't work. When I click one of them, it prints this:
[code] Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14 at palidino76.rs2.io.Frames.setItems(Frames.java:632) at palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption1.handlePacket(NPCOption1.java:226 ) at palidino76.rs2.players.Player.process(Player.java:1407) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:168) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
What's wrong with it?

item.title: [508] What the hell
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

I have 2 NPCS that don’t work. When I click one of them, it prints this:

Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14
        at palidino76.rs2.io.Frames.setItems(Frames.java:632)
        at palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption1.handlePacket(NPCOption1.java:226
)
        at palidino76.rs2.players.Player.process(Player.java:1407)
        at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:168)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

What’s wrong with it?
